cs.IT, cs.CC, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper focuses on decoding of polar codes, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The proposed decoding algorithm aims to reduce complexity, which is a common concern in coding theory (cs.CC). The paper also discusses simulation results, which suggests a focus on practical applications (cs.SI). The use of counters and thresholds to identify correct and incorrect paths is a form of data structure and algorithm design (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses the error performance of the proposed decoder, which is a topic in machine learning and statistics (cs.LG).
